name: GetPlayerAnimationIndex
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3b and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Returns the index of any running applied animations.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: ID of the player of whom you want to get the animation index of.

return_values: 0 if there is no animation applied
related_fn: GetAnimationName: Get the animation library/name for the index.
